channel.title: CiTR -- State of Flux (2008)
channel.description: State of Flux is about heavy sub basslines and the evolution of bass. The intention is to pay due respect to the great achievements in the world of bass and search for modification, progression and experimentation because the electronic sound is always in flux. The goal is to seek new styles in the world's bass culture. The objective: seek motion.
channel.itunes:summary: State of Flux is about heavy sub basslines and the evolution of bass. The intention is to pay due respect to the great achievements in the world of bass and search for modification, progression and experimentation because the electronic sound is always in flux. The goal is to seek new styles in the world's bass culture. The objective: seek motion.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
